name: skel
description: Babel skeleton / boilerplate for NPM packages

scripts.coverage: npm run compile && ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover _mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register "lib/**/*.spec.js" -R spec
scripts.coveralls: npm run compile && ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel-core/register "lib/**/*.spec.js" -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Gadi Cohen
